seo.section3title: Below are some of the many vital tasks that are at the core of our SEO Strategy.

section3.title: Website Audit & SEO Assessment
section3.txt: A critical analysis from the ground up from design infrastructure & content to link profile & brand strength.

section3.title: Detailed Back-link Audit
section3.txt: We look at ALL links generated for a website in order to determine their value and remove spammy links.

section3.title: Business Profile Listings
section3.txt: These are influential, industry based directories that every business should target to gain traction in Local SEO.

section3.title: SEO Competitor Analysis
section3.txt: We conduct an exhaustive study of competitors in order to identify new link building & marketing opportunities.

section3.title: Content Creation & Marketing
section3.txt: High-quality, SEO optimized content (articles, blogs, press releases, social media posts & guest posts) that establishes Google rankings.

section3.title: Video/Infographics
section3.txt: Give your content an engaging twist! Our designers and video editors craft promotional infographics and videos that get more conversions.

section3.title: Extensive Keyword Research
section3.txt: The most important step in SEO, our keyword research is exhaustive and focuses on 'conversion keywords' that bring leads.

section3.title: Link-building Services
section3.txt: We build links on authoritative sites that ultimately link back to your website, leveraging their credibility and improving SEO.

seo.section_4p: Below is a typical task timeline of an SEO project.

section_4Box.title: Keyword Research Document
section_4Box.txt: We identify important keyword terms relevant to your industry, service, region, target audience and competitors to optimize your website for traffic and rankings.

section_4Box.title: Website Audit
section_4Box.txt: Here, an extensive analysis is performed that puts your site through multiple tests, identifying shortcomings and outlining results along with recommendations.

section_4Box.title: Content Plan
section_4Box.txt: Our team of content marketing experts suggest engaging, keyword-rich topics, keeping in mind your marketing objectives, brand voice and target market.

Home.BanerH1: We are the best Software Company in Kosova.

Section2.SectionH2_Info: Our mobile UI/UX design specialists create a conversion-driven mobile user experience that makes for high conversion and user retention.
Web design services comprise the processes of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design of any web-based solution.
Cloud infrastructure management services provide scalability to businesses. Where multiple users can share a common infrastructure.
We branding is mostly applied to intranets and portals, and it’s not just about improving the look and feel of a solution for the sake of it.
Web development services imply designing, building, integrating, scaling and maintaining dynamic software solutions that work via intranet or internet.
Management refers to the monitoring and administration of an organization’s information technology systems: hardware, software and networks.
